column4: I'm trying to install the Tahoma.ttf fonts, do I put them in ttf-dejavu or ttf-liberation directories?
putting them in the root dir of those should be fine.
sounds correct, that will install the font system wide
what process is it running under?
err I would follow magnetron, he has a better idea then me
wanna go try kill pulseaudio now?
eh? so does pulseaudio -k work or not?
err, you are using ubuntu right?
this isn't the first time I've had problems with the audio, this warrants an angry letter to the developers
ooh, backtrack is fun. But yeah, if if the devs took out PA then you need to talk to them
